General.Name: Enerplus Corporation
General.Description: Enerplus Corporation, together with subsidiaries, acquires, develops, and explores crude oil and natural gas in the United States. Its oil and natural gas properties are located primarily in North Dakota, Colorado, and Pennsylvania. Enerplus Corporation was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: The Dome Tower, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 2Z1
